import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import styles from '../../assets/cssModules/whychooseus.module.css' import useAxiosFetch from '../../hooks/useAxiosFetch'; import defaultData from '../../data/defaultData.json' const Benefits = () => { const getElement = (benefit, index) => { let className = ''; if (index % 3 === 0) className = `col-md-6 col-lg-4 pr-lg-5 pr-xl-5 mb-5 ${styles.reason}`; if (index % 3 === 1) className = `col-md-6 col-lg-4 px-lg-4 px-xl-4 mb-5 ${styles.reason}`; if (index % 3 === 2) className = `col-md-6 col-lg-4 pl-lg-5 pl-xl-5 mb-5 ${styles.reason}`; return (
{benefit.name}

{benefit.paragraph}

) } const [reasonList, setReasonList] = useState([]); const { data, fetchError, isLoading } = useAxiosFetch('http://localhost:3500/reasons'); useEffect(() => { if (isLoading) return; if (!isLoading && fetchError != null) { alert(fetchError + ' in Reasons !! Given Default'); setReasonList(prevReasonsList => defaultData.services.map((reason, index) => { return getElement(reason, index) })); return; } setReasonList(prevReasonsList => (data.map((reason, index) => { return getElement(reason, index) }))); }, [fetchError, data, isLoading]); return (

Outsourching enables companies to reduce their costs on resource management, overhead cost, labor, working space, etc.

RISK REDUCTION

{" "} Outsourching is a way of risk sharing. By outsourcing your software development taks, you are minimizing the risk.

SOCUS ON CORE BUSINESS

{" "} Outsourching enable customers to divert their attention from supplementary tasks to focusing on their core functions.

REDUCE TIME MARKET

The huge pool of IT workforce aned infrastructure that the offshore IT.

STAFFLING FLEXIBILITY

Outsourching will allow operations that have seasonal or cyclical demands to bring.

DIVERSE TECHNOLOGIES

Out sourching vendors have focus on particular have services and play in volume.

) } export default Benefits
